description:
calibre is the one stop solution to all your e-book needs.

calibre is an e-book manager. It can view, convert, edit and catalog e-books in all of the major e-book formats. It can also talk to e-book reader devices. It can go out to the internet and fetch metadata for your books. It can download newspapers and convert them into e-books for convenient reading. It is cross platform, running on Linux, Windows and macOS.
New features
- Tolino driver: Add support for latest firmware
- When showing completions for languages show all languages that contain the typed in string instead of only languages that start with the typed in string
  Closes tickets: 2130804
- When showing completions in substring match mode, order the completions by how close to the start the query is
- A new shortcut Ctrl+Alt+Shift+P to switch to the previously applied Virtual library
  Closes tickets: 2127819
Bug fixes
- FB2 Input: Fix a remote code execution vulnerability from maliciously crafted FB2 files
  Closes tickets: 2130764
- E-book viewer: Ignore soft hyphens when looking up words
  Closes tickets: 2130603
- Catalog export: Fix export of languages in BibTeX format
  Closes tickets: 2130573
- Windows: Fix Open With not working with Microsoft Paint
  Closes tickets: 2128853
Improved news sources
- Harper's Magazine
- Afrique 21
- Orient XXI
- The Atlantic
